context.title: Changelog for Rule: Video only element has description track
context.changelog: [{"commit":"e87fa0696963a2a7f950b35712cc93d9afb56dd7","msg":"fix: update links to WCAG21 resources (#776)","date":"1566375576"},{"commit":"71af6a0dfa82898888bcba743e9d1c700bdf92b8","msg":"Editorial changes (#725)","date":"1566371604"},{"commit":"12d14a9acaa5c5e403fe96f7ec14a8b12a3d2b13","msg":"fix: test if definition for  all referenced glossary terms exist (#634)","date":"1563353169"},{"commit":"1d7899bd85219c6661aa1600526663a8c922cb9b","msg":"Chore: Adapt site to ACT Rules CR format (#547)","date":"1557402394"},{"commit":"eaaf3b64c21d5ec1c665a8800710b35d88df073a","msg":"Template update - Video only element has description track (#539)","date":"1557262298"},{"commit":"a289b7510c398fc4366f3cf9d6bfc0bbb0c5529f","msg":"chore: rename files and update associations (#489)","date":"1556526852"},{"commit":"1ddc581088aa696b0875510158f2c57dd37c458a","msg":"chore: add unique id to all rules (#478)","date":"1555411093"},{"commit":"d38ab7e2d621f93aa213b0a151893bf3c9934ab8","msg":"chore: WCAG ACT RULES CG Website Update (#437)","date":"1555317646"},{"commit":"e71f9fbbf9de177da8f99179bcc76402c2188abf","msg":"1.2.1 audio only and video only  (#276)","date":"1547037237"}]
context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"ac7dc6","name":"Video only element has description track","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that description tracks that come with non-streaming `video` elements, without audio, are descriptive.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Visual output"],"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}
